p: We also evaluated viral replication in the lungs of mice infected with PR8/Len and PR8/AA. To that end, groups of C57BL/6 mice ( N = 6) were infected with 10 3 and 10 4 FFU of PR8/Len or 10 3 FFU of PR8/AA (doses that resulted in 100% survival, Figure 4) and viral replication was evaluated at days 2 ( N = 3) and 4 ( N = 3) p.i. ( Figure 5A). No statistically significant differences were observed in lung viral titers in animals infected with PR8/Len or PR8/AA, although higher viral titers were detected in the lungs of mice infected with 10 4 FFU of PR8/Len.
